title: Chat Restriction, wieso?
body:
Hallo zusammen,
Wieder einmal will Riot mir meinen Account wegnehmen und unterstellt mir ein Chatverhalten, das "far below the standards" ist. Wir alle wissen was League of Legends Standard/Alltag ist.Ich verhalte mich deutlich besser und spreche die Beleidigungen, die tatsächlich LoL Standard sind, niemals aus. Dennoch wurde ich chat restricted. bitte zeigt mir die genaue stelle, wo ich z.b. Toxisch war. Außerdem versuche ich eine Sammelklage zu organisieren. Ich möchte die Justiz darum bitten zu überprüfen, obs rechtmäßig ist, solche Spieler wie ich, dauerhaft zu bannen (siehe Sammelkalge Thread).

Am wichtigsten ist mir jedoch zu begreifen, was ich falsch gemacht habe. Wurden einfach nur die reports gezählt und ich dann chat restricted? Wenn ich nicht weiß was ich falsch mache, kann ich mich nicht verbessern. In ALL meinen Spielen verhalte ich mich weiterhin so wie in diesem Chatverlauf, weil ich absolut kein toxisches Verhalten sehe. Bitte erklärt es mir.

Vielen Dank

Game 1
Pre-Game
1v9GodCarryBeast: dodge or carry
In-Game
1v9GodCarryBeast: ez show penguin
1v9GodCarryBeast: again
1v9GodCarryBeast: yeee
1v9GodCarryBeast: camille: 1 Kayn: 0 ganks
1v9GodCarryBeast: itso k vel happened to me 5 times already ( on my team i mean=)9
1v9GodCarryBeast: so i got used toit
1v9GodCarryBeast: to losing games etdc
1v9GodCarryBeast: i still report tho bro its allowed
1v9GodCarryBeast: camille top 4rth time
1v9GodCarryBeast: i dont know how i can win this 1v3
1v9GodCarryBeast: shes 2 lvlss ahead
1v9GodCarryBeast: thats all
1v9GodCarryBeast: i want to have fun too
1v9GodCarryBeast: i waited the entire 11 min
1v9GodCarryBeast: 0 gnaks
1v9GodCarryBeast: now its my time to have fun
1v9GodCarryBeast: cool wave is pushing to me now
1v9GodCarryBeast: xD
1v9GodCarryBeast: do oyu mean i should give up and int? not my style bro
1v9GodCarryBeast: ?
1v9GodCarryBeast: i just got 3 manned and then 4 times ganked by u
1v9GodCarryBeast: what do you mean bro :)
1v9GodCarryBeast: After ur gank
1v9GodCarryBeast: sure
1v9GodCarryBeast: the 1v2 :)
1v9GodCarryBeast: gotcvha
1v9GodCarryBeast: ?
1v9GodCarryBeast: the only reason i didnt run back was i didnt give asist to u
1v9GodCarryBeast: ?
1v9GodCarryBeast: what do you want acamille?
1v9GodCarryBeast: stop harrasing me or i have to report u
1v9GodCarryBeast: and hes still going
1v9GodCarryBeast: incredible
1v9GodCarryBeast: can we all report camille plz?
1v9GodCarryBeast: hoily
1v9GodCarryBeast: leave me alone
1v9GodCarryBeast: wow so toxic this camile report her plz
1v9GodCarryBeast: camille muted and reported
1v9GodCarryBeast: no u mad cuase u died?
1v9GodCarryBeast: wahts that piungign?
1v9GodCarryBeast: stop spam pinging
1v9GodCarryBeast: good.
1v9GodCarryBeast: ofc im in the position to chat
1v9GodCarryBeast: everyone is
1v9GodCarryBeast: its a human right
1v9GodCarryBeast: what kind of regime are you trying to create?
1v9GodCarryBeast: i split bot now
1v9GodCarryBeast: 2 towers to get
1v9GodCarryBeast: botlane ur top now
1v9GodCarryBeast: ?
1v9GodCarryBeast: geegee
1v9GodCarryBeast: sry camille cant read ur tilt i muted u
1v9GodCarryBeast: damn i missed it- maybe i sshouldnt mute u
1v9GodCarryBeast: ?
1v9GodCarryBeast: i 1v9 this shitt
1v9GodCarryBeast: the carry hjas awaken
1v9GodCarryBeast: has*
1v9GodCarryBeast: open ur eyes dude
1v9GodCarryBeast: farem lvl 18
1v9GodCarryBeast: and we win
1v9GodCarryBeast: im focused
1v9GodCarryBeast: gg
Post-Game
1v9GodCarryBeast: more dmg than poppy
1v9GodCarryBeast: gg
Game 2
Pre-Game
1v9GodCarryBeast: is thsi tryout q?
1v9GodCarryBeast: casue ima tryout new stuff then too
1v9GodCarryBeast: fur fun q
1v9GodCarryBeast: elo aint matter
1v9GodCarryBeast: tell me
1v9GodCarryBeast: dodge or carry
In-Game
1v9GodCarryBeast: another troll botlane
1v9GodCarryBeast: epiuc
1v9GodCarryBeast: i jsut keep losing losing elo due to troll botlnaes
1v9GodCarryBeast: why do they stack up on my team lawaysß
1v9GodCarryBeast: LAWAYS
1v9GodCarryBeast: fuk it
1v9GodCarryBeast: why did u ping me shaco
1v9GodCarryBeast: stop tilting me
1v9GodCarryBeast: im romaing now
1v9GodCarryBeast: lets go
1v9GodCarryBeast: this meta
1v9GodCarryBeast: its all babout crushing early
1v9GodCarryBeast: lets go
1v9GodCarryBeast: omw bot
1v9GodCarryBeast: summs bot?
1v9GodCarryBeast: shield?
1v9GodCarryBeast: as u want lulu
1v9GodCarryBeast: enjoy  it
1v9GodCarryBeast: as u want
1v9GodCarryBeast: omw mid
1v9GodCarryBeast: omw bot
1v9GodCarryBeast: gan k
1v9GodCarryBeast: stop in
1v9GodCarryBeast: sry im bad
1v9GodCarryBeast: at least i gave my best
1v9GodCarryBeast: hi vlad
1v9GodCarryBeast: hows it going?
1v9GodCarryBeast: enjoyng it?
1v9GodCarryBeast: good luck everyone
1v9GodCarryBeast: hmm i think attacking u makes no sense
1v9GodCarryBeast: u jsut healed my entire combo
1v9GodCarryBeast: report orianna insult thank u
1v9GodCarryBeast: all im saying is thats why im standing supersave behind tower incase vald is wondering
1v9GodCarryBeast: cause he will only hit towers not me
1v9GodCarryBeast: at all
1v9GodCarryBeast: dont know if its fun
1v9GodCarryBeast: why do u ping me?
1v9GodCarryBeast: if i def i die
1v9GodCarryBeast: i dont int
1v9GodCarryBeast: i dont troll
1v9GodCarryBeast: now i have to be even more save
1v9GodCarryBeast: cuase no flash
1v9GodCarryBeast: why r eport im jsut having a bad game
1v9GodCarryBeast: but why?
1v9GodCarryBeast: they want to report me cause i dont fdef tower/ inhib
1v9GodCarryBeast: iu would die if i do
1v9GodCarryBeast: right vald?=
1v9GodCarryBeast: why?
1v9GodCarryBeast: im not soft inting
1v9GodCarryBeast: mnaybe it was the wrong choiuce to roam after i lsot lane
1v9GodCarryBeast: cuase
1v9GodCarryBeast: ?
1v9GodCarryBeast: now was that inting by vald?
1v9GodCarryBeast: dojnt worry vlad i wont report u
1v9GodCarryBeast: cuase u didsnt int just liek i didnt int/ soft int
1v9GodCarryBeast: Gg
1v9GodCarryBeast: thx
Post-Game
1v9GodCarryBeast: wait a sec
1v9GodCarryBeast: botlane goes 0/12
1v9GodCarryBeast: im 4/5
1v9GodCarryBeast: and i int?
1v9GodCarryBeast: well report botlane too then at least if u report me thank u
1v9GodCarryBeast: let riot decide
1v9GodCarryBeast: <3 thank u all
Game 3
In-Game
1v9GodCarryBeast: u got executed?
1v9GodCarryBeast: i had gragas solo
1v9GodCarryBeast: u fuked my lane kha
1v9GodCarryBeast: leave ME ALONE
1v9GodCarryBeast: i had him solo
1v9GodCarryBeast: u stole the gkill
1v9GodCarryBeast: now carry !
1v9GodCarryBeast: no ult
1v9GodCarryBeast: i said DO NOT COME TOP
1v9GodCarryBeast: report kha insult
1v9GodCarryBeast: kha muted and reported
1v9GodCarryBeast: report braum insult
1v9GodCarryBeast: braum muted and reported
1v9GodCarryBeast: i remember u all who to report and why, i got the quotes listed
1v9GodCarryBeast: i knew it he cant carry.
1v9GodCarryBeast: look at kha top
1v9GodCarryBeast: cfarmin mmy lane
1v9GodCarryBeast: look
1v9GodCarryBeast: im not inting, my main jax got banned thats all, im an otp
1v9GodCarryBeast: im just bad on other champs
1v9GodCarryBeast: gg wp all
1v9GodCarryBeast: btw i had to mute klha and braum cause the were constantly harassing me, its ok tho
1v9GodCarryBeast: nah im fine win some lose some
1v9GodCarryBeast: i cant escapoe
1v9GodCarryBeast: gg wp
Post-Game
1v9GodCarryBeast: so, khazix insulted me with "2 digit iq" and braum insulted with....let me think
1v9GodCarryBeast: what was it again
1v9GodCarryBeast: uhm
1v9GodCarryBeast: i dont eremember the exact word
1v9GodCarryBeast: but im 100% he insulted me
1v9GodCarryBeast: gg wp efverywone
1v9GodCarryBeast: what was it kah said again
1v9GodCarryBeast: there are so many one tricks in challenger
1v9GodCarryBeast: /high elo
1v9GodCarryBeast: i feel like no sense in learning newe champs
1v9GodCarryBeast: until i learn the game first
1v9GodCarryBeast: i wish i was tilt free
1v9GodCarryBeast: but im only human
1v9GodCarryBeast: like u are
1v9GodCarryBeast: look our team tilted and flamed me
1v9GodCarryBeast: and i tilted after khas first gank
1v9GodCarryBeast: i chipped away
1v9GodCarryBeast: wave for wave
1v9GodCarryBeast: on gragas healrth
1v9GodCarryBeast: for liek 5 min
1v9GodCarryBeast: then he was low like 200hp
1v9GodCarryBeast: i coulkd solo gragas
1v9GodCarryBeast: kha came in and jsut destroyed ita ll
1v9GodCarryBeast: i couldnt focuis anymore, i tried to
1v9GodCarryBeast: somehow it went downhill from there
1v9GodCarryBeast: u2

replies.body:
Da du mit rechtlichen Schritten drohst, schließe ich diesen Thread in deinem eigenen Interesse.
Bitte berate dich mit deinem Anwalt über weitere Schritte und wende dich an die Rechtsabteilung von Riot Games, deren Kontaktdaten du den [Nutzungsbedingungen](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/de/legal/termsofuse) entnehmen kannst.
